Package bacnet.scripts.arrayexpress

Class ArrayExpress

  • java.lang.Object
    • bacnet.scripts.arrayexpress.ArrayExpress
  • public class ArrayExpress
extends java.lang.Object
    Different methods to curate and parse the different data for Listeriomics website

    ONLY METHODS BEFORE FINAL DATA PROCESSING ARE PRESENT HERE
    Author:
    UIBC

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Static Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      static void cleanDataTable()
      Method to remove the unsued lines in the data files for BUGS and MEXP technologies If those lines remain present it causes failures to create the curated tables with the global method
      static void copyTranscriptomicsTable()
      Copy the transcriptomics curated table in the NormData>ExprMatrix folder
      static void createArrayExpressTable()
      Create a new txt file containing all the accession data for every file to download
      static void createArrayTable()
      Create a txt file giving the name of each array technology
      static void createComparisonsTable()
      Use the BioConditions and the curated sdrf files from ArrayExpressRawData folders to create a Comparison table
      static void createTechnologiesTable()  
      static ExpressionMatrix curateMatrix​(java.lang.String dataPath, boolean comparison)
      Read a potential ExpressionMatrix, remove all duplicate rows by calculating mean when 2 or more rows have same name.

      • curateMatrix

        public static ExpressionMatrix curateMatrix​(java.lang.String dataPath,
                                            boolean comparison)
        Read a potential ExpressionMatrix, remove all duplicate rows by calculating mean when 2 or more rows have same name. WARNING: No annotation information is allowed, only real values
        Parameters:
        dataPath -
        comparison - true if it is an ExpressionMatrix for a comparison, if no LOGFC column are found in a row, it will delete the row (gain speed and space)
        Returns:
